motivation: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
technology: The computer was born to solve one problem, which is to compute faster.
Technology is best when it brings people together.
The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don’t even notice it.
life: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
